name: (LD51) Pizza Time!!!
description:
//WARNING: Game includes vulgar language, blood, gore and other things a lot of people don't like.

Welcome to Pie To Die For, It's pizza... to die for!

Here you must serve customers and destroy critics to satisfy Skalg the Immortal. You have 3 minutes to complete as many orders as possible. You will receive a score at the end.

You can gain more score by completing orders faster and by keeping the star rating high.

Make sure any corpses are disposed of to prevent your star rating from lowering.

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51

(LDJAM LINK: https://ldjam.com/users/real-flamingicecubegames/)

Software used: Famitracker, Audacity, Godot Game Engine, Aseprite
